title: Your public web application needs to provide access to binary files for registered users only. How would you achieve this?

choices.a: Host the files on a public external file sharing service.
choices.b: Redirect to the file which resides in the server's document root
choices.c: Use PHP to send the file to the client, using the header() function to set appropriate HTTP headers
choices.d: PHP is used for service HTML content, not binary content
